a beautiful mountainous valley located in the Gilgit- Baltistan region of Pakistan
Nagar (Nagar) is a former princely state and one of the ten districts of Gilgit-Baltistan, Pakistan.
The city is located in a broad valley near the confluence of the Gilgit River and Hunza River,
You can reach it through the Karakoram Highway.
